Server.Name: Survive Enter At Your Own Risk
Server.Description:
Survive enter at your own risk Patch Notes: Some recipes have been changed to 1:1 ratio Packrats beware Encumberance is a bish in this mod Backpacks are craftable in basic survival quests Tier3 items have RNG 1-6 Mod slots Bloodmoon, Roaming and screamer hoards? Watch out there's a nice surprise waiting Cement crafting has been moved to Cement mixer with the Concrete mix Rocket launchers have been removed For Dedicated server support Due to Random people blowing up your bases with them This mod also includes Nitrogen Worlds 8k 10k and 12k and also Some challenge maps for those who want a challenge Watch out Getting a Broken, Sprain leg Or Concussion Will Give you a nasty debuff If you get hit by a zombie, THis also applies To Infections as well Complete ALL The Mining books For a nice Mining surprise From Iron There are a Ton more Animals in this mod There iu also a custom UI with Health mana food and water Also I have added Custom Menu Art made by myself
Now Proudly Sponsored By Crossfire hosting Services For good Quality Reliable Hosting services at a cheap price Choose cross fire hosting services 7 Days to die Starting at Â£9.99 p/m Come Join our Community https://discord.gg/tsBwP8V
I have also with permission added the following Mods From Khaine: Khaines bigger bloodmoons Khaines HP bars Khaines Pick up plants Special Thanks: The Fun Pimps Max Fox Khaine SphereII For all the help With the code Testers: OociaTony THEBOSSHOGG DragonWolfDarkMatter Graffic Friskain Misterri and the Nerd community Buttons85 Jadawin Enter at your own risk Discord server link to Report bugs or suggestions:https://discord.gg/bTSGZ7H
